title: Hot and sour prawn noodle soup
description: A spicy, warming noodle soup recipe with exciting flavours thatâ€™s ready in just 15 minutes.
ingredients: 2 large red chillies, deseeded and halved, plus extra, sliced, to garnish
Juice of 1 lime, plus lime wedges, to garnish

method.Step 1: Put the stock, halved chillies, ginger, lime leaves (if using), fish sauce, lemongrass, lime juice and sugar in a big saucepan and bring to the boil. Cover, simmer for 4 minutes, then strain into a clean pan.

method.Step 2: Add the mushrooms and prawns and cook for 2-3 minutes until the prawns turn pink. Add the pak choi, and leave to wilt for 1 minute.

method.Step 3: Cook the noodles according to the packet instructions and divide among 4 bowls. Ladle the soup over the noodles, garnish with sesame seeds, red chilli and lime wedges, and serve.
